alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay and northeastern Midland Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Edenville, or near Sanford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, cloud to ground lightning, and winds to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain will lead to ponding of water and reduced visibility with dangerous cloud to ground lightning also occuring. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Bay and northeastern Midland Counties, including the following locations... Mount Forest, Averill, Crump, Bombay and Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
